app.title: Folder Fusion X
app.description: Visualize and explore directory structures with multiple view options. Select a local directory or enter a GitHub repository URL to get started.

wallet.title: Crypto Wallet
wallet.disclaimer: Please verify all addresses before sending any cryptocurrency. We are not responsible for funds sent to incorrect addresses.

quickStart.title: Quick Start:
steps: Select directory or enter repo URL

pathInput.clickToChoose: Click to choose a local directory

help.title: How to Use Folder Fusion X
help.gettingStartedDesc: Folder Fusion X helps you visualize directory structures in multiple ways:
help.graphViewDesc: Visual node-based representation of your directory
help.textViewDesc: Plain text representation that can be copied or saved
help.settingsDesc: Click the settings icon to customize:

errors.invalidGithubUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL
errors.enterGithubUrl: Please enter a GitHub repository URL
errors.tokenInvalid: Invalid token. Please check and try again.
errors.requestTimeout: Request timed out. This could be due to a large repository or network issues.
